This is a simple tutorial for add an Event/Action to Omnidroid

==Add Event==

= Introduction =
To add an event, you need to make changes to the following classes:

'''AndroidManifest.xml''' -- add support to service, activity etc.

'''src/edu/nyu/cs/omnidroid/core/IntentParser.java''' -- add the support to the new intent

'''src/edu/nyu/cs/omnidroid/core/SomeEvent.java''' -- the wrapper for the new event.

'''src/edu/nyu/cs/omnidroid/external/attributes/EventMonitoringService.java''' -- add more monitor if you need.

'''src/edu/nyu/cs/omnidroid/external/attributes/SomeMonitor.java''' -- the new monitor.

'''src/edu/nyu/cs/omnidroid/model/DbData.java''' -- prepopulate the db.

'''src/edu/nyu/cs/omnidroid/ui/simple/FactoryDynamicUI.java''' -- create UI support for the new event.


here's an example code review for add a new event:
http://codereview.appspot.com/890043/show
